name: Remnant Foldover Clutch
description:
Made from megan auman fabric with a reclaimed leather bottom, this clutch is perfect for stashing your wallet, keys, lipstick, phone, even an iPad.

All the fabric in my collection begins life as an original painting on canvas before being digitally printed on fabric.

Perfect as an everyday bag or for an evening out, this clutch was designed and made by eclu, in collaboration with megan auman.

Each clutch is handmade and one of a kind, leather color and fabric pattern may vary.

Approximately 11" x 10" when open and 6" x 10" when folded.

Comes in a fabric bag for shipping and storage.

name: droplet post earrings
description:
The perfect every day post earrings.

Available in bronze with 14-kt gold-filled ear wires or sterling silver.

Approximately 3/4" high.

name: Maya necklace reversed - SHIFT COLLECTION
description: An update on my signature statement necklace, the Maya. Links of steel cascade towards links of bronze in a two-tone, ombr√© effect that's sure to pop. The Maya necklace is the ultimate statement piece. Instantly take any outfit from humdrum to WOW with this gorgeous necklace. Made from welded steel and bronze wire. The Maya necklace is also available in reverse, with bronze cascading towards steel. The Maya necklace is approximately 22" long, a great length for a variety of necklines. Comes in a gift box, tied with a ribbon. Treat yourself or a loved one! The Maya necklace is made to order, so please allow 2-3 days for shipping. Caring for steel: Steel is a versatile, lightweight material for jewelry. All steel jewelery is sealed with wax to prevent rust. Your necklace will hold up well over time, but I recommend you take it off before jumping in the shower or pool.

name: shift bracelet
description:
Two-tone bracelet.

Available in steel and bronze (shown) or steel and silver.

Size small: approximately 7"
Size large: approximately 8"

name: December Grey Skinny Statement Scarf
description:
Why wear just any scarf when you can make a statement?

Each scarf in my collection begins life as an original painting on canvas before being digitally printed on fabric. The result - a stunning piece of art that you can wear to make a statement every day!

Made from an organic cotton knit, this infinity scarf is the ultimate statement accessory. Wrap it once, twice, loop it, knot it, or even wear it as a headband - the possibilities are endless!

At half the width of our original statement scarf, the skinny scarf gives you plenty of impact without the bulk. Perfect for warmer weather!

And the fabric is so soft and cozy, you'll want to wear it everywhere!

Approximately 7" wide by 54" around

This scarf is handmade and some variation may occur. Made in small batches in my Pennsylvania studio and available in limited quantities.

100% organic cotton

Care: machine wash gentle with phosphate-free detergent and tumble dry low (or air dry)

name: tiny leaf ornament
description:
Beautiful laser cut ornament featuring one of my signature leaf patterns.  Powder coated in snow white to stand out on any tree, but so pretty you‚Äôll want to display it year round.

Perfect for holiday decorating or gift giving.  Slip one on a bottle of wine for a quick hostess gift, or use one to dress up a package.  

Each ornament is laser cut from steel and powder-coated for a durable protective finish.  Comes with a ribbon for hanging.  Ribbon color is assorted.

3‚Äù diameter (not including ribbon).

Includes free shipping to the US and Canada.  Ships via US Postal Service.

name: Reflections Skinny Statement Scarf
description:
Think of this infinity scarf as a statement necklace that also keeps you warm. Wear it long to add a pop of color to any outfit or wrap it twice to keep yourself warm (and bring that pop of color to your face). The organic cotton knit is so soft, you'll want to wear it all winter long. (Not to mention fall and spring too!)

Each scarf in my collection begins life as an original painting on canvas. I use enthusiastic brush strokes, playful drips, and color and contrast to create paintings full of movement and energy. After the painting is complete, I create a digital print on fabric before sewing it into the finished scarf. The result - a stunning piece of art that you can wear to make a statement every day!

Approximately 6.5" wide by 54" around

This scarf is handmade and some variation may occur. Made in small batches in my Pennsylvania studio and available in limited quantities.

100% organic cotton

Care: machine wash gentle with phosphate-free detergent and tumble dry low (or air dry)

Wear this stunning silk scarf any number of ways.  It's the perfect year round accessories that's dressy enough to work in the office or for an evening out, but easy enough to dress down as well.

Each scarf in my collection begins life as an original painting on canvas. I use enthusiastic brush strokes, playful drips, and color and contrast to create paintings full of movement and energy. Approximately 35" x 41"

This scarf is handmade and some variation may occur. Made in small batches in my Pennsylvania studio and available in limited quantities.

100% silk

Care: dry clean only

name: droplet hoop earrings
description:
Available in sterling silver or bronze with 14-kt gold-filled ear wires.

Approximately 1 1/2" high.

name: large droplet hoop earrings
description:
A statement hoop that works for every day.

Available in sterling silver or bronze with 14-kt gold-filled ear wires.

Approximately 2 1/4" high by 1 1/2" wide.

name: Alice necklace - shift collection
description:
You'd be hard pressed to find a necklace as versatile as the Alice necklace from my shift collection.  With alternating sections of steel and bronze, this 36" chain can be worn long or doubled.  But the real versatility comes from the color blocks. Short or long, you can play with the placement of the steel and bronze to coordinate with every style and neckline in your wardrobe.  It's like getting six necklaces in one! 

36" long chain is made from steel and bronze. Each link is 1/2" by 1". The chain has an S-hook clasp and can be worn long or doubled. Worn long, the chain falls to approximately stomach length.

Made from welded steel and bronze wire.

Comes in a gift box. Treat yourself or a loved one!

Caring for steel:

Steel is a versatile, lightweight material for jewelry. All my steel jewelery is sealed with wax to prevent rust. Your necklace will hold up well over time, but I recommend you take it off before jumping in the shower or pool.

name: large droplet post earrings
description:
Available in sterling silver or bronze with 14-kt gold-filled ear wires.

Approximately 1 1/2" high.

name: Audrey necklace - shift collection
description:
Two-tone necklace in steel and bronze (or steel and silver).  Wear it with the bronze in front, the steel in front, or split down the middle - it's like having three necklaces in one!

18" long chain is made from steel and bronze. Each link is 1/2" by 1". The chain has an S-hook clasp and can be worn long or doubled. Worn long, the chain falls to approximately stomach length.

Made from welded steel and bronze wire.

Comes in a gift box. Treat yourself or a loved one!

Caring for steel:

Steel is a versatile, lightweight material for jewelry. All my steel jewelery is sealed with wax to prevent rust. Your necklace will hold up well over time, but I recommend you take it off before jumping in the shower or pool.

name: Gabrielle earrings - medium
description: I like to think of these as the Mary Poppins of earrings - "Practically perfect in every way." This simple, classic earrings have become the new, go-to favorite of every person who owns them, and they can be yours too. Easy enough to wear every day, but with enough style to ensure you'll never want to take them off. (Though I do recommend taking them off in the shower or swimming pool.) Made from bronze with 14-kt gold plated ear wires. (As shown.) Also available in steel with sterling ear wires, steel with 14-kt gold plated ear wires, or all sterling silver. The medium Gabrielle earrings are approximately 2" tall (from the bottom of the earring to the top of the ear wire) and 3/4" wide. Comes in a matte black gift box tied with a ribbon. The perfect gift for yourself or someone else!

name: Maya necklace - SHIFT COLLECTION
description: An update on my signature statement necklace, the Maya. Links of bronze cascade towards links of steel in a two-tone, ombr√© effect that's sure to pop. The Maya necklace is the ultimate statement piece. Instantly take any outfit from humdrum to WOW with this gorgeous necklace. Made from welded steel and bronze wire. The Maya necklace is also available in reverse, with steel cascading towards bronze. The Maya necklace is approximately 22" long, a great length for a variety of necklines. Comes in a gift box, tied with a ribbon. Treat yourself or a loved one! The Maya necklace is made to order, so please allow 2-3 days for shipping. Caring for steel: Steel is a versatile, lightweight material for jewelry. All steel jewelery is sealed with wax to prevent rust. Your necklace will hold up well over time, but I recommend you take it off before jumping in the shower or pool.

name: Gabrielle earrings
description:
Don't let the size of these earrings fool you - they're simple and classic enough that they might just become your new every day pair!

Available in three options - steel with sterling ear wires, sterling silver, or 14-kt gold-filled - these earrings are lightweight enough to wear all day and easy enough to wear with everything.

The simple yet stunning design makes them perfect to throw on with everything - I've worn them as often with yoga clothes to run errands as I have with statement pieces like the Maya necklace.

Each earring is approximately 4" long and comes packaged in a gift box - the perfect treat for yourself or a loved one!

name: Vivienne earrings
description:
Bold and easy to wear, the Vivienne earrings are for the girl who knows how to make a statement.

Available in two options - steel and silver with silver ear wires or steel and 14-kt gold-filled with gold-filled ear wires.

These earrings are big enough to get noticed, but light enough to wear all day long (or all night out)!

Each earring is approximately 4.75" long.

name: Elsie necklace
description:
Part of my little black necklace collection, the Elsie necklace is a versatile long chain that's perfect for wearing to work or an evening out.

Made from welded steel wire, the Elsie necklace features accents of sterling silver or 14-kt gold filled wire.

The Elsie necklace is approximately 34" long.

Comes in a gift box, tied with a ribbon. Treat yourself or a loved one!

Caring for steel:

Steel is a versatile, lightweight material for jewelry. All steel jewelery is sealed with wax to prevent rust. Your necklace will hold up well over time, but I recommend you take it off before jumping in the shower or pool.

name: Audrey necklace
description: Part of my little black necklace collection, the Audrey necklace is a classic necklace for everyday wear or a night on the town. This chain is made from welded steel links with one link of silver or 14-kt gold filled for contrast. Each link is 1/2" by 1". The overall length is 18", but can be adjusted shorter. The chain has an S-hook clasp. Made from welded steel and silver wire. Comes in a gift box, tied with a ribbon. Treat yourself or a loved one! Caring for steel: Steel is a versatile, lightweight material for jewelry. All my steel jewelery is sealed with wax to prevent rust. Your necklace will hold up well over time, but I recommend you take it off before jumping in the shower or pool. Pin It

name: Alice necklace
description:
Part of my little black necklace collection, the Alice necklace is a versatile necklace sure to become a wardrobe staple. Dress it up or down - wear it long or short!

36" long chain s made from steel with accents of sterling silver or 14-kt gold-filled.. Each link is 1/2" by 1". The chain has an S-hook clasp and can be worn long or doubled. Worn long, the chain falls to approximately stomach length.

Made from welded steel and silver wire.

Comes in a gift box, tied with a ribbon. Treat yourself or a loved one!


Caring for steel:

Steel is a versatile, lightweight material for jewelry. All my steel jewelery is sealed with wax to prevent rust. Your necklace will hold up well over time, but I recommend you take it off before jumping in the shower or pool.

name: Lucy necklace
description:
One necklace, so many possibilities!

Part of my little black necklace collection, the Lucy necklace is the most versatile of the bunch.  Sure to become a wardrobe staple, you can wear your Lucy necklace super long, double, long and short, or even tripled.

52" long chain is made from steel with accents of sterling silver or 14-kt gold-filled. Each link is 1/2" by 1". The chain has an S-hook clasp and can be worn long, doubled or tripled. Worn long, the chain falls to approximately hip length.

Made from welded steel and silver wire.

Comes in a gift box, tied with a ribbon. Treat yourself or a loved one!


Caring for steel:

Steel is a versatile, lightweight material for jewelry. All my steel jewelery is sealed with wax to prevent rust. Your necklace will hold up well over time, but I recommend you take it off before jumping in the shower or pool.

name: Annie necklace
description:
Part of my little black necklace collection, the Annie necklace is sure to become your new favorite necklace.

It's simple enough to wear everyday (I've even worn it with a tank top and hoodie) but classic enough to wear on your next big night out.

Made from welded steel wire, the Annie necklace features an off-center focal point - one link of either sterling silver or 14-kt gold filled wire.

The Annie necklace is approximately 19" long, a great length for a variety of necklines.

Comes in a gift box, tied with a ribbon. Treat yourself or a loved one!



Caring for steel:

Steel is a versatile, lightweight material for jewelry. All steel jewelery is sealed with wax to prevent rust. Your necklace will hold up well over time, but I recommend you take it off before jumping in the shower or pool.

name: Emma necklace
description:
Part of my little black necklace collection, the Emma necklace is a show stopper that's sure to turn heads.

With a more open and airy feel than her sister, the Maya necklace, the Emma necklace sure to make a statement but easy enough to wear every day.

Made from welded steel wire, the Emma necklace features accents of sterling silver or 14-kt gold filled wire.

The Emma necklace is approximately 22" long, a great length for a variety of necklines.

Comes in a gift box, tied with a ribbon. Treat yourself or a loved one!



Caring for steel:

Steel is a versatile, lightweight material for jewelry. All steel jewelery is sealed with wax to prevent rust. Your necklace will hold up well over time, but I recommend you take it off before jumping in the shower or pool.

name: Amelia necklace
description:
Part of my little black necklace collection, the Amelia necklace is sure to become your new favorite necklace.

It's simple enough to wear everyday (I've even worn it with a tank top and hoodie) but classic enough to wear on your next big night out.

Made from welded steel wire, the Amelia necklace features an off-center focal point (which is larger than the Annie necklace) - one link of either sterling silver or 14-kt gold filled wire.

The Amelia necklace is approximately 20" long, a great length for a variety of necklines.

Comes in a gift box, tied with a ribbon. Treat yourself or a loved one!



Caring for steel:

Steel is a versatile, lightweight material for jewelry. All steel jewelery is sealed with wax to prevent rust. Your necklace will hold up well over time, but I recommend you take it off before jumping in the shower or pool.

name: Maya necklace
description: Part of my little black necklace collection, the Maya necklace is a show stopper that's sure to turn heads. With more links and a denser feel than her sister, the Emma necklace, the Maya necklace is the ultimate statement piece. Instantly take any outfit from humdrum to WOW with gorgeous necklace. Made from welded steel wire, the Maya necklace features accents of sterling silver or 14-kt gold filled wire. The Maya necklace is approximately 22" long, a great length for a variety of necklines. Comes in a gift box, tied with a ribbon. Treat yourself or a loved one! Caring for steel: Steel is a versatile, lightweight material for jewelry. All steel jewelery is sealed with wax to prevent rust. Your necklace will hold up well over time, but I recommend you take it off before jumping in the shower or pool. Pin It

name: Susan necklace
description:
Part of my little black necklace collection, the Susan necklace is one of my most popular styles.

Easy to wear, but with enough going on to keep life interesting, the Susan necklace is an instant classic.

Made from welded steel wire, the Susan necklace features accents of sterling silver or 14-kt gold filled wire.

The Susan necklace is approximately 20" long, a great length for a variety of necklines.

Comes in a gift box, tied with a ribbon. Treat yourself or a loved one!



Caring for steel:

Steel is a versatile, lightweight material for jewelry. All steel jewelery is sealed with wax to prevent rust. Your necklace will hold up well over time, but I recommend you take it off before jumping in the shower or pool.

name: long Susan necklace
description:
This long version of the Susan necklace is contemporary and classic at the same time.

Made from welded steel wire, the long Susan necklace features accents of sterling silver or 14-kt gold filled wire.

The long Susan necklace is approximately 36" long, and can be worn long or doubled.

Comes in a gift box, tied with a ribbon. Treat yourself or a loved one!



Caring for steel:

Steel is a versatile, lightweight material for jewelry. All steel jewelery is sealed with wax to prevent rust. Your necklace will hold up well over time, but I recommend you take it off before jumping in the shower or pool.

name: Lena necklace
description:
Part of my little black necklace collection, the Lena necklace is one of my most popular styles.

Easy to wear, but with plenty of power, the Lena necklace is an instant classic.

Made from welded steel wire, the Lena necklace features accents of sterling silver or 14-kt gold filled wire.

The Susan necklace is approximately 20" long, a great length for a variety of necklines.

Comes in a gift box, tied with a ribbon. Treat yourself or a loved one!



Caring for steel:

Steel is a versatile, lightweight material for jewelry. All steel jewelery is sealed with wax to prevent rust. Your necklace will hold up well over time, but I recommend you take it off before jumping in the shower or pool.

name: Mia bracelet
description:
With four curving links, the Mia bracelet is elegant in its simplicity.

Easy enough to wear every day, the Mia bracelet is perfect by itself and even better when paired with the Greta bracelet.  (Or layer lots for an even bigger statement.)

Made from lightweight and durable steel wire, the Mia bracelet is available with accents of either sterling silver or 14-kt gold filled wire.

Size small/medium is approximately 7" in length, size medium/large is approximately 8".

name: Grete bracelet
description:
With wrist hugging curves, the Grete bracelet is a simple stunner.  

Bigger and bolder than the Mia bracelet, the Greta bracelet is still easy enough to wear every day.

Wear the Greta bracelet by itself for a classic, architectural look, layer it with the Mia bracelet for adding impact, or stack several together for the ultimate statement.

Made from lightweight and durable steel wire, the Grete bracelet is available with accents of either sterling silver or 14-kt gold filled wire.

Size small/medium is approximately 7" in length, size medium/large is approximately 8".

name: Nellie earrings
description:
Steel leaves frame a sterling silver or 14-kt gold filled centerpiece to make the light as a feather Nellie earrings.

Perfect for every day wear, but certainly not boring, the Nellie earrings are sure to become your new go-to earrings.

Smaller than the Rachel earrings, the Nellie earrings are approximately 2 1/2" tall and 1" wide.

name: Ella earrings
description:
Steel leaves are framed by sterling silver or 14-kt gold filled wire to make the light as a feather Ella earrings.

Perfect for every day wear, but certainly not boring, the Ella earrings are sure to become your new go-to earrings.

Smaller than the Eva earrings, the Ella earrings are approximately 2 1/2" tall and 1" wide.

name: Rachel earrings
description:
Steel leaves frame a sterling silver or 14-kt gold filled centerpiece to make the light as a feather Rachel earrings.

Perfect for every day wear, but certainly not boring, the Rachel earrings are sure to become your new go-to earrings.

Larger than the Nellie earrings, the Rachel earrings are approximately 3" tall and 1" wide.

name: Eva earrings
description:
Steel leaves are framed by a sterling silver or 14-kt gold filled wire to make the light as a feather Eva earrings.

Perfect for every day wear, but certainly not boring, the Eva earrings are sure to become your new go-to earrings.

Larger than the Ella earrings, the Eva earrings are approximately 3" tall and 1" wide.

name: Kathrine earrings
description:
*As seen in Better Homes and Gardens!*

Light as a feather but larger than most, the Kathrine earrings are sure to stand out.

Whether you're looking for earrings for your big night out, or something fun to wear every day, the Katherine earrings have you covered.

Made from lightweight steel wire, the Katherine earrings feature accents (and ear wires) of either sterling silver or 14-kt gold filled wire.

Approximately 4" long by 1" wide.

name: Nellie necklace
description:
Made from steel wire with accents of sterling silver or 14-kt gold filled, the Nellie necklace is a simple sweetheart you're sure to love.

The Nellie necklace comes on an 18" long handmade chain with an S-hook clasp in the front.  The front clasp means you can wear it as a sweet little pendant or lariat style.

Pendant is approximately 1 1/2" tall by 1" wide.

name: Rachel necklace
description:
Bigger and bolder than the Nellie necklace, the Rachel necklace is still simple enough to wear every day.

Made from steel wire with accents of sterling silver or 14-kt gold filled, the Rachel necklace is a simple sweetheart you're sure to love.

The Rachel necklace comes on an 18" long handmade chain with an S-hook clasp in the front.  The front clasp means you can wear it as a sweet little pendant or lariat style.

Pendant is approximately 2" tall by 1" wide.

name: steel and silver leaf bracelet
description:
A classic bracelet for everyday wear.

This chain is made from welded steel links with one silver link for contrast. Each link is 1/2" by 1". The chain has an S-hook clasp. 

Size small - 7"
Size large - 8"

Please specify size when ordering.

Comes in a gift box, tied with a ribbon. Treat yourself or a loved one!


Caring for steel:

Steel is a versatile, lightweight material for jewelry. All my steel jewelery is sealed with wax to prevent rust. Your necklace will hold up well over time, but I recommend you take it off before jumping in the shower or pool.

description:
A stunning bracelet - perfect for getting a little dressed up.

Bracelet features 3 strands of chain made from welded steel links with sterling silver links for contrast. Each link is 1/2" by 1". The bracelet has an S-hook clasp. 

Size small - 7"
Size large - 8"
Please specify size when ordering.

Comes in a gift box, tied with a ribbon. Treat yourself or a loved one!


Caring for steel:

Steel is a versatile, lightweight material for jewelry. All my steel jewelery is sealed with wax to prevent rust. Your bracelet will hold up well over time, but I recommend you take it off before jumping in the shower or pool.

name: November Pillow - 16" x 20"
description:
This limited edition pillow is only available in November.

Each pillow in my collection begins life as an original painting on canvas. I use enthusiastic brush strokes, playful drips, and color and contrast to create paintings full of movement and energy. After the painting is complete, I create a digital print on fabric before sewing it into the finished pillow. The result - each pillow has the depth and texture of an original painting but the durability of a printed fabric. It's the perfect blend of art and function.

18" pillow cover features original art with a linen, envelope stye back. Includes a pillow insert so it's ready to use.

This item is handmade and some variations may occur. Made in small batches in my Pennsylvania studio and available in limited quantities.

Materials: 
Cover front: Cotton Linen blend 
Cover back: Linen 
Insert: Faux down in a 100% cotton casing

Care: 
Cover: hand wash/air dry or dry clean 
Insert: wash and dry on gentle cycle

name: Gift Card
description:
Not sure what she wants? A gift card is always perfect!

Available in $25, $50, $75, and $100.  Redeemable at shop.meganauman.com.

Order before December 15 and receive a physical gift card in a gift box by mail.

Order after December 15 (or international orders) and receive a PDF gift card to print or email.

name: droplet ring
description: What do you get when you take my signature leaf shape, make it a little more round, and make it out of thick gauge gold-filled wire? You get the swoon-worthy new droplet rings! I've been dreaming of a ring this shape for a while now, and when I accidentally ordered the wrong size gold-filled wire, it seemed like fate was telling me it was finally time. I've been wearing a stack of three of these rings ever since, and they are a joy to wear. The little point adds visual interest without being too, well, pointy. The thick material makes them incredibly comfortable (and you won't have to worry about distorting the shape). And every person who's seen them immediately asks for some of their own! The droplet ring is also incredibly versatile - you can wear it alone, stack it with rings you already have, or do what I've been doing and wear a stack of three! Made from 14-kt gold-filled wire (that's 14-kt gold over brass). Each ring is made to order in your size, so please allow up to five days for your ring to ship. Available in half sizes 5 through 10. Your ring comes packaged in a little black gift box tied with a bow - the perfect gift for yourself or a loved one!

Regularly $80, you can grab a set of three (of the same size) for $210! Your rings comes packaged in a little black gift box tied with a bow - the perfect gift for yourself or a loved one!

name: leather cozy/cuff SNAP - mocha brown
description: WINTER SALE - buy a cozy/cuff SNAP and receive an original cozy/cuff FREE! leather cozy/cuff SNAP in mocha brown The cozy/cuff SNAP is a reusable coffee cup sleeve that doubles as a bracelet. Or a bracelet that doubles as a coffee cup cozy. Either way, it‚Äôs a stylish, eco-friendly alternative to the coffee shop cardboard sleeves. Here are just a few of the reasons why you‚Äôll love the leather cozy/cuff SNAP: You can wear it year round. In leather, the cozy/cuff SNAP makes the perfect all season accessory. It‚Äôs comfortable to wear, even in the summer. It looks great with everything. The leather cozy/cuff SNAP is the ultimate accessory ‚Äì it instantly makes any outfit cuter, and looks great on any coffee cup. It gets better with age. The more you wear and use your leather cozy/cuff, the softer and more supple the leather becomes. (As if you needed another reason to wear it everyday.) It fits your wrist and your coffee cup perfectly. With two sets of snaps, the leather cozy/cuff is designed to fit both your wrist and your coffee cup. Just snap it on the larger size and slide it on your coffee cup. When you‚Äôre done, slip it off and snap it back on your wrist. It‚Äôs eco-friendly. Not only can you feel good about saving trees by replacing disposable cup sleeves with you cozy/cuff, but you can also be happy about that fact that it‚Äôs made from vegetable-tanned leather and colored with eco-friendly low-VOC dyes. SIZE Fits standard 12, 16, and 20 oz cups. Size small fits wrists up to 7‚Äù. Size medium fits wrists up to 7 ¬Ω‚Äù. Approximately 2 ¬æ‚Äù tall and 10‚Äù long. MATERIAL Laser cut from vegetable-tanned leather and colored with eco-friendly low-VOC dyes. COLOR Mocha brown with nickel silver snaps. As a result of the laser cutting, edges are dark brown. CARE Wipe clean. Made in the USA.
